title: Womens Dress
title_original: Ferand Women's Lightweight Poncho Sweater Versatile Shawl Wraps Holiday Gifts for Women 2024

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #194,176 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #2,835 in Women's Pullover Sweaters #3,390 in Women's Shops

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Pullovers

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the poncho stylish, with one mentioning it can be turned for different looks, and appreciate its soft fabric and warm feel. The garment fits well and offers good value for money, while being versatile enough to dress up or down any outfit. They like the color options and consider it a wonderful addition to their wardrobe.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful poncho!
items.body: For a very inexpensive garment, this poncho is beautiful! It’s soft and looks perfect in red, the color I bought. Read more
items.author: Karen Q.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Love lt!
items.body: Soft fabric good coverage over a sweatshirt even. Light weight but warm enough. Was not sure I would like buttons - but ads versatility and interest. Read more
items.author: BTTR2010

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great wardrobe staple
items.body: The fit and feel of this garment is nice. It's a wonderful addition to ones wardrobe. I am not so sure about that one size fits most business. I am a big girl at 5'8" and 200lbs, and to me I am probably at the tail end of being able to wear this thing and not look ridiculous. There are two ways to wear this poncho, and one way reads matronly and the other is more hip to me. I wear a matching tank underneath to unify the look. It's pretty warm, so I wouldn't wear anything too heavy underneath this poncho if you plan on wearing it as a top. The company makes a plethora of other ponchos. Check out those too before making your final selection. Read more
items.author: E.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this.
items.body: Love this poncho. It looks very nice with a dress or even over jeans. It’s light enough to carry with you for those chilly nights. You can also wear it as a long sleeve or short depending on how you turn it. Sizing is true. Excellent purchase. Bought it for a fall wedding and it worked well. Read more
items.author: Island girl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great poncho, not too long, warm and soft
items.body: I just received the poncho today. I'm 5'3. The front of the poncho is about 2 inches below my waist line. The side is at about my wrists making it the perfect length. (I don't have to work it to get my hands out from under the poncho.) The material is warm, soft, and light. I travel by plane a lot, and I always bring a cashmere scarf with me on the plane for the cold air. The problem with the scarf is that it doesn't stay on/around my shoulders. Now the poncho will definitely take its place. The one I ordered is color gray. It is actually gray/white strips, making it a more modern look than the solid gray, I think. The only drawback of this item is that there is no caring instructions or information on the material. I got a feeling that it requires hand wash but not 100% sure. Read more
items.author: Terrie

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Navy Color Isn't Navy, But Nice Poncho
items.body: Very disappointed. Color is awful. Supposed to be Navy, but it's interwoven with dark plums & some color I can't even identify. If they set out to make this the ugliest, most drab color possible, they succeeded. Though I don't care for the color, I do love the style, weight, and fit. This is my second Ferand. I very much like everything about the first. I intend to reorder this style in a different color. Read more
items.author: Gail LV06

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: So comfy cozy and sheek great to throw on and go warm and stylish wish it came in other colors Read more
items.author: Lori

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect
items.body: Love it !! Been looking everywhere for a plain black poncho & this meets all the needs!! Read more
items.author: Eileen D

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Khaki, Dark Grey, Black, Navy Blue, Light Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
